name: Rat Quest (pichy)
description:
A movement-based game created by Pichy Jumpholwong, Chase Houske, and Stephanie Kroah. Players must navigate to find all pieces of cheese through exploring the busy city! Sounds came from https://www.zapsplat.com/sound-effect-category/cartoon-animals/page/4/.  

Pichy Jumpholwong (me) - artist 

Chase Houske - programmer

Stephanie Kroah - sounds/designer
